languages.text: "Найдите набожного и верного человека в экипаже, который будет для пустотнорожденных своим. Чужаки нам не нужны".
"Appoint a loyal crew member who is known for the strength of their faith — someone the children of the void will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."
languages.original_text: "Найдите набожного и верного человека в экипаже, который будет для пустотнорожденных своим. Чужаки нам не нужны".

traits.locale_text: "Find a devout and faithful person among the crew who the voidsmen will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."
"Find a devout and faithful person among the crew who the voidsmen will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."
"Go find a crew member who is known to be particularly devout and faithful — someone the voidsmen will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."
"Go find a crew member who is known to be particularly devout and faithful — someone the voidsmen will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."
"Appoint a loyal crew member who is known for the strength of their faith — someone the children of the void will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."
"Appoint a loyal crew member who is known for the strength of their faith — someone the children of the void will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."

languages.text: "Ernennt ein loyales Besatzungsmitglied, das für seine Glaubensstärke bekannt ist – jemanden, den die Kinder der Leere als ihresgleichen akzeptieren. Wir wollen keine Außenstehenden."
languages.original_text: "Appoint a loyal crew member who is known for the strength of their faith — someone the children of the void will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."

traits.locale_text: "Ernennt ein loyales Besatzungsmitglied, das für seine Glaubensstärke bekannt ist – jemanden, den die Kinder der Leere als ihresgleichen akzeptieren. Wir wollen keine Außenstehenden."

languages.text: «Designe a un miembro leal de la tripulación que sea conocido por la convicción de su fe; alguien a quien los hijos del vacío reconozcan como uno de los suyos. No queremos forasteros».
languages.original_text: "Appoint a loyal crew member who is known for the strength of their faith — someone the children of the void will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."

traits.locale_text: «Designe a un miembro leal de la tripulación que sea conocido por la convicción de su fe; alguien a quien los hijos del vacío reconozcan como uno de los suyos. No queremos forasteros».

languages.text: 「信仰の強さで知られる忠実なクルーを任命しよう。ヴォイドの子らが仲間と認識する誰かがいい。よそ者はお断りだ」
languages.original_text: "Appoint a loyal crew member who is known for the strength of their faith — someone the children of the void will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."

traits.locale_text: 「信仰の強さで知られる忠実なクルーを任命しよう。ヴォイドの子らが仲間と認識する誰かがいい。よそ者はお断りだ」

languages.text: “在船上找个忠诚的船员吧，找那种非常虔诚，所有人都认可的人。船员会更容易认可我们自己的人，我们不需要外人。”
languages.original_text: "Appoint a loyal crew member who is known for the strength of their faith — someone the children of the void will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."

traits.locale_text: “在船上找个忠诚的船员吧，找那种非常虔诚，所有人都认可的人。船员会更容易认可我们自己的人，我们不需要外人。”

languages.text: « Désignez un membre de l'équipage loyal, réputé pour sa foi inébranlable, un individu que les enfants du vide reconnaîtront comme l'un des leurs. Nous ne voulons pas d'étrangers dans nos rangs. »
languages.original_text: "Appoint a loyal crew member who is known for the strength of their faith — someone the children of the void will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."

traits.locale_text: « Désignez un membre de l'équipage loyal, réputé pour sa foi inébranlable, un individu que les enfants du vide reconnaîtront comme l'un des leurs. Nous ne voulons pas d'étrangers dans nos rangs. »

languages.text: "Göreve inancının gücüyle bilinen sadık bir mürettebat üyesini atayın. Uçsuzun çocuklarının kendilerinden bildiği birini. Dışarıdan birini istemiyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Appoint a loyal crew member who is known for the strength of their faith — someone the children of the void will recognise as their own. We do not want any outsiders."
